title: Hex - Wear Watch Face
summary: The time as a hex triplet
description: Hex is a Watch Face for Android Wear using the current time as a hex triplet to colour the face and display the time.Day and date is shown when not in ambient mode and no peek cards are visible.Inspired by: http://www.jacopocolo.com/hexclock/Fork me: https://github.com/jrdnull/HexWatchThanks to Cyril Mottier for the device frame used in the feature graphic, http://cyrilmottier.com/2014/07/31/android-wear-flat-device-frame/
descriptionHTML:
Hex is a Watch Face for Android Wear using the current time as a hex triplet to colour the face and display the time.

Day and date is shown when not in ambient mode and no peek cards are visible.


Inspired by: http://www.jacopocolo.com/hexclock/
Fork me: https://github.com/jrdnull/HexWatch


Thanks to Cyril Mottier for the device frame used in the feature graphic, http://cyrilmottier.com/2014/07/31/android-wear-flat-device-frame/
comments: I love this. Understated, clean, efficient. Would have 5 stars if the date format could change to DDMMYYYY.
This works well and I really like the idea, but it will randomly decide when to show the date.
Good concept and clean presentation but misleading name. Provide for actual hex representation and I'll give five stars.
